name: intelligent-windows-desktop
description: Intelligent defaults for Windows desktop VM - auto-detects hardware
_comment: Windows requires more resources than Linux for optimal performance

_detection_notes.vcpus: Auto-calculated as 25-40% of host cores (min 4 for Windows)
_detection_notes.memory_mb: Auto-calculated as 4GB per vCPU for Windows (min 8GB total)
_detection_notes.disk_gb: 80GB for Windows OS, applications, and updates
_detection_notes.disk_format: qcow2 for snapshots before Windows updates
_detection_notes.network_mode: NAT for security, isolated from host network
